meanings.definition: A person or thing that influences.
meanings.sent1: My mom is one of the biggest influents in my life.
meanings.sent2: Celebrities are often seen as powerful influents on social media.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot became an unexpected influents at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like a ray of sunshine, an influents that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The wise old owl in the story served as a guiding influents for the young characters.

meanings.sent1: The influential speaker had an influents impact on the audience.
meanings.sent2: She possessed an influents aura that drew people towards her.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten had an influents way of getting treats from its owner.
meanings.sent4: His words were like magic spells, casting an influents spell on those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The painting had an influents effect on the emotions of all who viewed it.
